Package me.agno.gridjavacore.searching

Class SearchProcessor<T>

java.lang.Object
me.agno.gridjavacore.searching.SearchProcessor<T>
public class SearchProcessor<T> extends Object
The SearchProcessor class is responsible for processing search operations on a grid. It provides methods to update the search settings and process search predicates.
